description: This table contains the original data of medication administrations that have been edited. The data is no longer a current representation of the MAR, but can be used for reporting purposes.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_TIME
columns.description: The scheduled time on the MAR.

columns.name: EDITED_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the previously saved data for this administration.

columns.name: TAKEN_TIME
columns.description: The user-specified time that the action took place.

columns.name: SAVED_TIME
columns.description: The instant the medication administration was saved.

columns.name: EDITD_MAR_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medication administration record (MAR) action category number for the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Given


Missed


Refused


Canceled Entry


Held


New Bag


Restarted


Stopped


Rate Change


MAR Hold


MAR Unhold


Bolus


Push


Rate Verify


See Alternative


Paused


Pending


Automatically Held


Due

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that took action on the administration.

columns.name: SEC_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the secondary user associated with this administration.

columns.name: EDIT_MAR_DOC_USR_ID
columns.description: User ID of the user who documented the medication administration.  This item is null unless the administering user (ORD 12120) is different than the documenting user.

columns.name: SIG
columns.description: The dose value of the administration.

columns.name: ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The route category number for the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The comment associated with the administration.

columns.name: REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason category number for the administration. A reason is generally required for the actions of Missed and medication administration record hold (MAR Hold), but can be configured for any action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The site category number for the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Right Arm


Left Arm


Right Quadriceps


Left Quadriceps


Right Upper Outer Quadrant


Left Upper Outer Quadrant


Abdominal Tissue


Port

columns.name: INFUSION_RATE
columns.description: The rate at which the medication was infused.

columns.name: EDIT_MAR_RATEUNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The infusion rate unit category number for the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dose unit category number for the administration.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EDIT_MAR_RATEUNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: EDITD_MAR_DURATION
columns.description: The length of time the administration took to complete or infuse.

columns.name: EDITD_DUR_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The duration unit category number for the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Minutes


Hours


Days

columns.name: EDIT_MAR_IMM_LNK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked immunization that is associated with this administration.

columns.name: EDITD_DUE_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The scheduled Medication administration record (MAR) action at a due time category number for the administration. This column will only be populated if Duration-Based Due Actions are configured (LSD 34640 and 34641).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EDITD_MAR_ACTION_C_NAME

columns.name: EDITED_MAR_BILL_ID
columns.description: This stores the 'billing provider' for a given administration.

columns.name: EDIT_BLOOD_INFO_LN
columns.description: This item stores the line pointer to the blood information, for this edit (ORD 13000).

columns.name: EDITED_CYCLIC_RATE_PARENT_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the parent administration of this cyclic rate change due time.

columns.name: EDITED_ORIGINAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: Edit history of the original amount if weight-based dose conversion or other unit conversion took place.

columns.name: EDITED_ORIGINAL_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Edited value of the original unit


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EDIT_MAR_RATEUNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: EDIT_CUP_IDENT
columns.description: This is the ID that dictates which cup an administration belongs to.

columns.name: EDITED_SCHEDULED_DOSE
columns.description: The dose that was scheduled to be due for the administration of an order with multiple possible doses.

columns.name: EDITED_SCHEDULED_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The scheduled dose unit category ID for the administration.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EDIT_MAR_RATEUNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: EDITED_CONCENTRATION
columns.description: The concentration for the administration.

columns.name: EDITED_DUR_BASED_PARENT_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the administration that created this duration-based due time.

columns.name: EDITED_DUR_BASED_CHILD_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the duration-based due time administration that was created by this administration.

columns.name: EDITED_CYCLIC_RATE_CHILD_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the following child administration of this cyclic rate change due time.

columns.name: EDITED_SCHEDULED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Scheduled administration amount when the order has multiple doses.

columns.name: EDITED_SCHEDULED_AMOUNT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Scheduled administration amount unit when the order has multiple doses. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EDIT_MAR_RATEUNIT_C_NAME
